summary.label:
The shopping wishlist app. One app for all your shopping wishes.

CREATE ONE or MULTI WISHLISTS.
One for yourself, your kids, your spouse. And one for the things you want to buy later. 

ADD ANYTHING FROM ANY STORE.
Save all links and product information with just one click, without leaving the browser.

SHARE YOU WISHLIST INSTANTLY.
Let your family, friends, and co-workers know what you want.

SMART SHOPPING
Receive promo codes, price drops, and deal alerts from the brands you love. Get the discount codes that work and the sales-best offer that interests you.
 
MORE:
+ Create your gift registry for Birthday, Christmas, Weddings, Baby shower
+ Invite your friends and family to view your wish list. They can reserve gifts. 
+ Receive birthday reminders
+ Web version (Profile view)

FAQ

Imagine you go online and browse different shopping websites using your native browser. When you see something you would like to buy later, with one click (share button), you can easily add it to your wishlist. The app automatically stores information like title, photos, description, price, currency, and a direct link to the product page. You can add anything from any website. Discover gift ideas and the newest trends. Receive notifications with promo codes (valid !) from brands you love.

How do I add gifts to my list?
There are three ways to do this:

FROM BROWSER
Activate the GiftBuster button into your bookmarks bar; that way, whenever you come across something you want, you can add that item without ever leaving your browser.

SAVE/COPY ANY ITEM ON GIFTBUSTER
MANUALLY

How do I activate the GiftBuster browser extension (widget)?
Open any page in Safari
Tap the Share icon
Swipe the grey icons in the bottom row and tap "More."
Turn On "Add Gift via GiftBuster" and tap "Done."
Now when you see an item you like, you can add it to your GiftBuster list without ever leaving the Safari browser by tapping the "Share" icon and then clicking "Add Gift via GiftBuster"!

How do I reserve gifts that I want to buy for my friends?
Go to your friend's list. Choose the gift you wish to buy. Tap "Reserve". Set reservation date (i.e. your friend's birthday or Christmas). Click "Continue".

Can I purchase gifts through the GiftBuster App?
No, you can't. You can browse and reserve gifts through the GiftBuster App. And then you go and buy them in person or online.

Can my friend see that I reserved a gift from his/her list?
That's the best part. The list makers can't see who and what was reserved on his/her list, but others can. So no more double gifting!

Can I cancel a gift that I had reserved?
Yes, you can. Go to the RESERVATIONS and click "Cancel." Click "Confirm."


Can I mark gifts that are on TOP of my list?
Yes, you can. When you are adding a new item to your list - check the "Prioritise" option. You can also add it later (edit).

How can I delete gifts from my list?
Long tap on the item image you want to delete. Click the "Delete" icon.

When I'm adding a new item manually, do I have to all the information fields?

The only information required is "Title" and one photo.

If I like an item from someone else's list, how can I add it to my list?
Long tap on the item image you want to save. Click the "Save" icon.

Who can see my GiftBuster profile?
All profiles are public by default unless you change your settings to private. To change it, go to "YOUR PROFILE" and tap the right top corner for settings.

What are the benefits of following others?
Friends on your list can instantly view your gift list, reserve gifts, receive birthday reminders. Only when you follow each other, you can reserve gifts from your lists.

How can I invite friends to use GiftBuster?
You can invite them by sending a text message or email. Go to "YOUR PROFILE" and tap the right top corner for settings. Tap "Find Friends," and then the "+" icon.

Are there birthday reminders?
When your GiftBuster friend has a birthday coming up, you will receive a notification one week in advance.
